title: Disconnected for no reason cant get back on at all
body: i was loading into a game and then i got disconnected and i tried to log back in but it keeps saying im typing the wrong password but i know i was, so i changed the password and it still wont work.

replies.body: This is happening to me right now - keeps happening at the end of games - which is bad timing, as it looks as if I'm rage quitting!  My Internet is perfectly fine, and the "LoL Lag Report" on the website tells me my connection is perfect.  Must be something with the client!
Please fix this patch asap. Its obviously not an issue with your end users. Experiencing same issue and it is a game changer, not just in game bt over all experience.

This sounds like a patch mismatch issue we've been tracking in our [sticky ](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/Oe3XBf34-incorrect-username-or-password)post.  Restarting your client should help get you updated to the current version, but if that doesn't help we also have a manual workaround:

Locate LeagueClientSettings.yaml within C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Open it with a text editor (such as Notepad, TextEdit, or Notepad++) and find gameflow-patcher-lock. It should have a number there.
Change the number to read "null" (without quotes)
Save the file.
Restart the client.

Hopefully this will do the trick, unless there is a more underlying issue reaching our game server that caused your disconnection in the first place.  Just in case, I recommend also going through the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to make sure your connection is healthy. 

I know that's a lot of steps, but it should get you squared away!
